EmailTemplate.name: Auto-Submitted to Appraiser
EmailTemplate.subject: Auto-Submitted to Appraiser
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Auto-Submitted to Appraiser
Dear {!AppraiseeName} ,
Since you failed to submit the Appraisal form to the Appraiser within the given date, your Appraisal form is Auto-Submitted to the {!AppraiserName}.
For further Querries and doubts please contact {!AppraiserName}.
Thank & Regards,
KRIYA(PMS)
